analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x5575fb6f191ca376de2b36e023d1b1968d870ac9.sol:
	Contract AquaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x5575fb6f191ca376de2b36e023d1b1968d870ac9.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x5575fb6f191ca376de2b36e023d1b1968d870ac9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x5575fb6f191ca376de2b36e023d1b1968d870ac9.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x5575fb6f191ca376de2b36e023d1b1968d870ac9.sol#91) is not in mixedCase
